title: MCP Declarative Layout Tools
description: Add declarative layout control to MCP tools, allowing LLMs to create complex terminal layouts from natural language descriptions like 'create a 65% 35% vertical split with the right side split into quadrants'. Expose the existing layout.rs capabilities (nested layouts, custom ratios, presets) through MCP.
user_impact: Enables LLMs to create sophisticated multi-pane layouts in a single tool call, dramatically improving the expressiveness of natural language terminal control.
